import React from 'react' import './refund.css' const Refund = () => { return ( <>

cancellation / refund policy

Rank boost is currently selling only one digital product worth of INR 699. if you once made the payment for the course then there is no refund scheme for your program. However, if any technical issues occur, where you make the payment and your subscription did not get activated then you can contact us through our customer support, and we will verify the details of the payment you have made and then will make your subscription active.
Rank boost does not offer any refund on the current course.

) } export default Refund
